page.title: 16CEREAL GROWING NEAR YANWORTH
page.content: { Wheat}for profit and yield is the best crop,3-4tonnes/acre.It is milling wheat for bread or feed wheat for corn merchants and broiler chickens. Some {barley}is for estate cattle food, most is sold for concentrates. {Oats}is for estate use or is sold for porridge. A{total weedkiller }6 weeks before harvesting prevents fungus diseases. Spraying a {Plant Development (Growth) {Regulator}in March--April gives larger root structure_in May stronger stalks. The mature crop is strenghened against wind/rain,so improving the harvesting. {Powerful tractors}- upto 150 h.p.- can plough steep slopes and modern machinery needs less men. New{powerful {driers}can safely dry a crop. {Large {circular straw bales }are easier to handle. Controversial{stubble burning gives easier cultivation of the next crop and destroys weed seeds etc.
